snippet.title: This is a Ghost - Horror Game 2022 Trailer (en) #1
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1985420/This_is_a_Ghost/
This is a Ghost - Horror Game 2022 Trailer #1
✔ Abonne-toi : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6RRssFMnx1x1m-DXaHDltA/?sub_confirmation=1

This is a Ghost is a surnatural investigation game. You are a member of a secret society that hunts or sets free entities in our world. Gather evidence, identify the entity and send it back to the other world.

 - Start your investigation with a set of tools to find clues to a haunting.
 - 45 possibilities ! 15 entities with unique characteristics and 3 associated behaviours. Will you succeed in your contract ?
 - Find out more about the entity by conducting your survey and complete your contract.
 - Destroy the threat or release the haunting from this world.
 - Increase your reputation among secret societies and unlock new contracts.

🔴 Retrouvez-moi en live sur Twitch : https://www.twitch.tv/nucitv

#thisisaghost
